sentences.en: A new method, three stage carbonization process, to reclaim gallium from alumna production is introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了一种氧化铝生产流程中回收镓的新方法 ——— 三段碳酸化法.

sentences.en: During alumna production, mother liquor evaporation is the key process.
sentences.cn: 在氧化铝生产过程中, 母液蒸发是关键的工艺过程.

sentences.en: If Mary and Bill graduate from our school, she is alumna and he is an alumnus.
sentences.cn: 假如玛莉和比尔从我们学校毕业的话, 那麽她就是女校友,而他则是男校友.

sentences.en: Invite a least one Rotary Foundation alumnus or alumna to join your club.
sentences.cn: 至少邀请一位扶?基金会前受奖人加入贵社.

sentences.en: My alumni and alumna are present at my birthday party.
sentences.cn: 我的男校友和女校友都出席了我的生日聚会.

trans.tran_en: a woman who is a former student of a school, college etc
